/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the cityscape. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban environment. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. In the distance, mountains rise against the sky, adding a natural element to the urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky.
